name: Chat App
description:
Join a room and chat with friends! Choose a username and a room name and let everyone join the fun. Make sure to create a unique room name to talk with your friends ! 
 
 This chat application was made with ReactJS for the client-side and Socket.io and a little bit of Express for the server-side.
shortdescription: Join a room and chat with friends! Choose a username and a room name and let everyone join the fun.…

name: Planning Tool
description:
Planning Tool lets students register themselves and choose 3 courses to follow. Planning is dynamic and is adapted for each student. Administrators can manage users, teachers, courses and plan a number of sessions for each course in an instant. 
 
 Using Laravel Sail, the goal was to create a back-end application in a Docker Container. Tables in the database have some relationships between eachother but nothing complex. 
 
 This was created for my Back-End course I took in 2023
shortdescription: Planning Tool lets students register themselves and choose 3 courses to follow. Planning is dynamic…

name: Medialab Loan
description:
Users can register and log in to the system. They then get to see a list of items and copies of said items with a description, serial number etc. Users can then click on the 'Reserveer' button to go to a reservation details page where users can choose when they need the item and when they are to return it.  
 
 Users that log in or make a loan should receive an e-mail sent to the e-mail they use to register and login.  
 
 This project was made in collaboration between two students as a course project for the course Develoment IV at Erasmushogeschool in Brussels.
shortdescription: Users can register and log in to the system. Users can then choose an object…

name: Dynamic Transitions
description:
The point of this project was to learn how to implement dynamic transitions between pages and implement more animation with animation libraries such as Framer Motion. As content I used my passion for manga. 
 
 This is an Expert Lab project made for school.
shortdescription: The point of this project was to learn how to implement dynamic transitions between pages…

name: Kapüt Quiz
description:
As a Quizmaster, you are able to create a Quiz and add questions to it. As a player, you can also play all the quizzes that have been made. 
 
 This is an Expert Lab project made for school.
shortdescription: As a Quizmaster, you are able to create a Quiz and add questions…

name: React Three Fiber
description:
Using React and React Three Fiber, I created a customisable environment around the 3D model of my choice. 
 
 This is an Expert Lab project made for school.
